channel.title: Animation aka graphics? pi question! (317)
channel.description: im on 317 and i want better looking stuff like trees and etc anyone know a tut on this at all? i have base and source i like. is there a way to make 317 run animation aka graphics = (508-662-718) can someone bump a good grand ex. Please like a guy u can trade not a bag.

item.title: Animation aka graphics? pi question! (317)
item.dc:creator: @thomashawkins1991 thomashawkins1991
item.description:
@thomashawkins1991 wrote:

[quote=“iBunnie, post:10, topic:501034”][quote author=thomashawkins1991 link=topic=619263.msg4252866#msg4252866 date=1362419654]

Lol… Sorry for saying this, but I’m not convinced you know a lot of coding, so you might aswell just take a 525 or so as base…

i know wat im doing to a point… is there away to take a base n switch w mine

It’s possible but not recommended at all. Yes, there is ways to make things better. For instance, trees are objects. If you are going to add higher revision objects, you might as well add the maps to go with them. This is all mostly cache editing and packing, theres many tutorials out there. Sadly i am in high doubt anyone is going to do it all for you for free, so you’re better off just sticking with what you have. Good luck on your rsps adventure.

i dont want anyone to do it for me if they do i cant learn u got a link to something to get me in the right path?
[/quote]
If you REALLY want to learn yourself, you also need to learn how to search. Here’s the link i can help you with: google.com[/quote]
OMG thank you! so sweet of u!!!

Read full topic
